00078     void Being::setAnimation(const std::string &name)
00079     {
00080         // if name is empty, unset the animation
00081         if (name.empty())
00082         {
00083             mSetAnimation = NULL;
00084             mUpdateTime = 0;
00085             return;
00086         }
00087 
00088         // delete any old animation that was set
00089         delete mSetAnimation;
00090 
00091         // get existing animation
00092             Animation *body = resourceManager->getAnimation(look.body, name);
00093             if (!body)
00094             return;
00095 
00096         // get existing animation
00097             Animation *hair = resourceManager->getAnimation(look.hair, name);
00098             if (!hair)
00099             return;
00100 
00101         // create new animation to store the new frames
00102         mSetAnimation = new Animation;
00103 
00104         // create new frames and store them in the animation
00105         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < body->getFrames(); ++i)
00106         {
00107             Texture *tex = graphicsEngine->createAvatarFrame(mId, i, body->getTexture(), hair->getTexture());
00108             mSetAnimation->addTexture(tex);
00109             body->nextFrame();
00110             hair->nextFrame();
00111         }
00112 
00113         mUpdateTime = 1000 / mSetAnimation->getFrames();
00114     }
00115 }
